00015 #ifndef _CONSUMECOMMENTS_
00016 #define _CONSUMECOMMENTS_
00017 void consumeComments( string& word, ifstream& fin, const string commentMark, bool debug )
00018 {
00019     bool moreLines = false;
00020     int count = 0;
00021     if( debug )
00022     {
00023         cout << "Notify: Entering consumeComments" << endl;
00024     }
00025   
00026     //if the line begins with the comment mark, consume it and move on 
00027     while( word.find( commentMark ) == 0 || moreLines )
00028     {
00029         word = "";
00030         count++;
00031         char dump;
00032         //might be easier with some sort of fin.seek()
00033         
00034         while( fin.peek() != EOF && fin.peek() != '\n' )
00035         {
00036             fin >> dump;
00037             if( debug )
00038             {
00039                 cout << "Notify: dumping: " << dump << endl;
00040             }
00041         }
00042 
00043         if( fin.peek() == '\n' )
00044         {
00045             char newline = '\n';
00046             fin.read( &newline, sizeof( newline ) );
00047         }
00048        
00049         if( fin.peek() == '#' )
00050         {
00051             moreLines = true;
00052         }
00053         else
00054         {
00055             moreLines = false;
00056         }
00057     }
00058 
00059     if( count > 0 && fin.peek() != EOF )
00060     {
00061         fin >> word;
00062     }
00063 
00064     if( debug )
00065     {
00066         cout << "Notify: exiting consumeComments" << endl;
00067         cout << "Notify: word now: " << word << endl;
00068     }
00069 }
00070 #endif
